DDL.statement: ALTER TABLE SYS_PRINTERS ADD GROUP_ID VARCHAR2(15) DEFAULT ''

UPDATE SYS_MODULES SET REPORT_FILENAME = 'Zebra_A5_Standard.lbl' WHERE UPPER(REPORT_FILENAME) = 'ZEBRA_A5_X2.LBL'
